title: Ritual Caster
content:
Ritual Caster You learn two ritual spells of your choice.

You learn two ritual spells of your choice.

Ritual Caster is a Feat in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

BG3 Ritual Caster Information

You learn two ritual spells of your choice. Class Feature: Ritual Caster: Free Spells

Ritual Caster: Free Spells

How to unlock Ritual Caster IN BG3

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Ritual Caster All Classes at Level 4

All Classes at Level 4

BG3 Ritual Caster Tips & Notes

You can choose two ritual spells of your choice from that class's list. As a Warlock, you will still follow Warlock rules in terms of casting spells. You are only able to cast them once per rest despite being ritual spells. Notes & Tips go here
